cons: During pregnancy or post pregnancy while breastfeeding, one should never consume large proportions of these seeds as it may be harmful.
Excessive use can give rise to bile over secretion and causes abnormal conditions in your liver.
description: It is a great source of potassium, iron, vitamins A, K, and C, folic acid, magnesium, and calcium that can heal many health issues.
Coriander is quite effective in curing various skin diseases like eczema, itchy skin, rashes, and inflammation. It also helps cure mouth ulcers and sores.
Coriander seeds and fresh coriander leaves help in healthy digestion.coriander seeds enables the healthy production of collagen that helps retain skin elasticity.
It also helps heal wounds, maintain healthy connective tissues, and guards against common cold and flu.
Coriander seeds contain many essential vitamins and minerals, including iron, which helps prevent anemia .
